file_insights.focus: Comprehensive package-level documentation for toolexec package
Comprehensive example implementations and tests for toolexec package

patterns_discovered: Fluent API for input and output configuration
gotchas_discovered: Need to handle context cancellation in long-running operations
Managing errors vs panicking in tool implementations
Proper resource cleanup and timeout management

approach_outcome.description: Create example tool implementation and usage documentation

recommendations: Use context cancellation checks in all long-running tools
Implement robust error handling with descriptive messages
Leverage middleware for observability and cross-cutting concerns
